newsitem.title: CHILE: Chile forex reserves fall to $15.28 billion.
newsitem.headline: Chile forex reserves fall to $15.28 billion.

text.p: Chilean net international reserves fell $21 million in the first two weeks of the month to total $15.28 billion on August 15, said the Central Bank in its monthly report.

The fall in the value of the reserves was the result of a $16 million drop in the balance of payments and a $5 million drop in the value of the reserves as the result of international currency fluctations, said the report.
The fall in the balance of payments was a result of a reduction in deposits paid by commercial banks to the Central Bank under reserve requirement rules, it said.
